name: You | Me (vertical slice)
description:
You | Me is a three-level vertical slice of the design for a minimalist puzzle game where the player controls two mirrored isometric cubes. The goal is to unlock a progression portal and successfully walk both cubes to the center without falling off the path.

! Note: At the end of the game, there is a deprecated questionnaire. Please disregard this as the database is no longer accepting new entries.

Sturdy | Kind Design © 2022
